A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi wasn't bad\, it just has a LOT of stupid. The plot device of setting a space battle to look like a WW2 naval/air battle could be great. If your going to do this\, then adapt the physics and strategy to space. While yuour at it\, figure out how anti gravity works. Lol\n\nCombine that with a missed place bond scene and you eat up half a movie. That being said their are some true Stars Wars moments that exceed what fans could have expected. Hopfuly Star Wars can figure out that they need to focus on a small band of rebels\, not an army of extras.
